name: MoldLab
description:
This is a Slime Mold Simulation. Inspired by Sebastian Lagues Youtube video: Ant and Slime Simulations. You control the characteristics of millions of single pixel spores. Changing the speed, the length of the trail and much more. Change the color scheme of the background to suite what is pleasing with plenty of presets. Play around and see what sort of behaviors and stunning lifelike structures you can make!


Features

  • Tutorial Introduction
  • Total Control of all simulation properties
  • Color Menu
  • Spore Preview
